md:
giải nghĩa từ "allowed" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* allowed (verb) /əˈlaʊd/:
	+ Meaning: to give permission for something to happen or be done.
	+ Vietnamese: cho phép, được phép.
	+ Example: "She allowed her children to stay up late."
	+ Related words: permit, authorize, approve, grant.

* allowed (adjective) /əˈlaʊd/:
	+ Meaning: permitted or approved.
	+ Vietnamese: được phép, cho phép.
	+ Example: "The allowed time for the exam is two hours."
	+ Related words: permissible, acceptable, legitimate, lawful.

Note: The verb "allowed" is often used in the passive voice, as in "She was allowed to stay up late."
html:

  • allowed (verb) /əˈlaʊd/:

    • Meaning: to give permission for something to happen or be done.
    • Vietnamese: cho phép, được phép.
    • Example: "She allowed her children to stay up late."
    • Related words: permit, authorize, approve, grant.

  • allowed (adjective) /əˈlaʊd/:

    • Meaning: permitted or approved.
    • Vietnamese: được phép, cho phép.
    • Example: "The allowed time for the exam is two hours."
    • Related words: permissible, acceptable, legitimate, lawful.

Note: The verb "allowed" is often used in the passive voice, as in "She was allowed to stay up late."
